markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=1349) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)

</column>

---

You can see through darkness. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).

**Special** You can select this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.
name: Celestial Eyes
